entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Matagami
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:09 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -13.3°C

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 20 in the afternoon. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Clearing in the afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature falling to minus 20 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 33 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 32 in the evening and minus 39 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023
